DOC.brief_summary: We hypothesize that a nutritional supplementation with higher than standard protein content (2.0 gm/Kg/day vs 1.4 gm/Kg/day) will result in improved whole-body net protein balance when administered to critically ill patients with acute renal failure (ARF).
DOC.brief_title: Assessment of Metabolic Response in Critically Ill Patients With Acute Renal Failure
